backend/main.mo: Defines core types and logic for users, players, matches, contests, and fantasy teams with authorization checks and CRUD-style methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings with evidence for authentication timeout and error-state improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend components and hooks for build and documentation use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, auth state, and conditionally shows profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Renders an authorization error card with a redirect button for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/AdminScoringForm: Admin UI for selecting matches, marking them finished, and submitting player point scores via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/AdminSeedPanel.t: Provides admin forms to create matches, add players, and create contests using various query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, auth controls, and routed content display.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Handles login/logout with Internet Identity, showing appropriate buttons and managing auth state.
frontend/src/components/AuthInitStatusBa: Displays authentication initialization status, showing loaders or error banners with retry options.
frontend/src/components/JoinContestDialo: Dialog for selecting a user team and joining a contest, with validation and join mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to enter a name and choose an avatar, saving their profile via a query hook.
frontend/src/components/TeamBuilder.tsx: UI for selecting 11 players, assigning captain/vice-captain, and saving a fantasy team for a match.
frontend/src/components/UserBadge.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user’s avatar and name using their profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthInit.ts: Tracks Internet Identity initialization with timeout handling, error states, and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity auth, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, matches, players, and contests.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface that checks admin status and shows tabs for data seeding and match scoring.
frontend/src/pages/ContestDetailPage.tsx: Displays contest details and leaderboard with loading states, navigation, and player data resolution.
frontend/src/pages/ContestsPage.tsx: Displays available contests for a match, handles loading states, contest status, and allows joining contests.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a hero landing page for unauthenticated users and a match list for authenticated users with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MatchDetailPage.tsx: Shows match details, available players, and provides navigation to contests and team building.
frontend/src/pages/MyContestsPage.tsx: Lists the user's joined contests with status, prize pool, participants, and navigation to leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/MyTeamsPage.tsx: Displays the user's fantasy teams with captain info, players, and handles loading or empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, known issues, and the overall fantasy sports app build plan.
